name: Verify Terminal Opening and Closing Controls
description: Validates that terminals can be opened with [E] or [LMB] and closed with [RMB].
testObjective: Ensure terminal interaction controls work correctly for opening and closing.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Approach the middle terminal until interaction prompt appears
steps.expected: Interaction prompt indicates [E] or [LMB] to interact
Terminal interface opens and displays sections
Terminal closes and returns to normal view

steps.action: Click [LMB] on the terminal to open it

postconditions: Terminal can be opened and closed reliably
